name: Greatest Skull Length
definition: From the anterior margin of the nasals to the posterior margin of the occiput.

name: Length of Nasals
definition: From the anterior margin of nasals to the suture between the nasals and the frontals.

name: Length of Rostrum
definition: From the anterior margin of the nasals to the anterior margin of the orbit.

name: Least Interorbital Constriction
definition: Least width on the interorbital constriction, at the frontals.

name: Width on Zygomatic Arches
definition: Major width on the zygomatic arches, at the jugals.

name: Basilar Length
definition: From the posterior margins of incisive teeth to the anterior margin of the foramen magnum.

name: Length of Incisive Foramen
definition: From the anterior margin of the incisive foramen, on the pre-maxillary, to the posterior margin of incisive foramen, on the maxillary.

name: Length of Diastema
definition: From the posterior margin of the incisive teeth to the anterior margin of premolar 4 (P4).

name: Palatal Length A
definition: From the posterior margin of incisive tooth to the anterior margin of mesopterygoid fossa.

name: Palatal Length B
definition: From to the anterior margin of P4 to the anterior margin of mesopterygoid fossa.

name: Length of Molar Series
definition: From to the anterior margin of P4 to the posterior margin of molar 3 (M3).

name: Post-Palatal Length
definition: From the anterior margin of mesopterygoid fossa to the anterior margin of the foramen magnum.

name: Length of Auditory Bulla
definition: From the stylar process to the posterior extremity of the auditory bulla.

name: Height of Braincase
definition: From the suture between basisphenoid and basioccipital to highest point (apex) of the braincase.

name: Width on Maxillary
definition: Major width of maxillary between M2 and M3.

name: Width of Rostrum
definition: Width of rostrum at the suture between premaxillary and maxillary.

name: Depth of Rostrum
definition: Minimum distance between diastema surface and the dorsum of rostrum, on nasals.
